overview:
Mark Neuman is the Founder & CEO of Corvin Capital. Corvin Capital, is an independent investment firm focused on Real Estate, Alternative Investments and Venture Capital.

Prior to founding Corvin Capital Mark was a Director at First Wall Street Capital. First Wall Street Capital has been involved as principals, investors, and advisors on over $10 Billion in transactions across a variety of industries over the last 25 years. Mark’s family background began in real estate over 75 years ago, which has given him an innate ability to work in every facet of Real Estate and finance. Mark has been involved as an advisor and manager on over 1 Million square feet of commercial and residential real estate.

Mark has managed holdings for his family and overseen acquisitions, dispositions and development. Mark’s passion for wine runs deep within his family, for half a century his family produced some of the best wine in Czechoslovakia. Mark and his family continued this tradition and invested in a privately held vineyard in Long Island, New York. Mark in his spare time assisted in marketing and public relations for the vineyard. Mark also has interests in the fields of computer science & technology.
